completion.item: <[!CDATA[Returns the content for this itemReturns: the content; ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the content control for this itemReturns: the control ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the tooltip text for this itemReturns: the tooltip text ]]>
<[!CDATA[Sets content for this item that appears in the client area of the TabFolder when this item is activated. Use EITHER setContent OR setControl!Parameters: string content - the content ]]>

<[!CDATA[Sets a control for that appears in the client area of the TabFolder when this item is activatedParameters: gara.jswt.Control control - the controlThrows: TypeError - when that is not a gara.jswt.Control ]]>

<[!CDATA[Sets the ToolTip text for this itemParameters:
string text - the tooltip text
				]]>
